column1: Happy Small Business Saturday!   As we continue to fight the #Covid19 pandemic and head into the holiday season continue to support and shop at neighborhood small businesses #SmallBizSat #ShopSmall #ShopLocal https://t.co/AA5z4toDKM

This morning I met with the Director of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention Dr. Robert Redfield and spoke to the Director of the Illinois Department of Public Health Dr. Ngozi Ezike about the sixth confirmed case of 2019 Novel Coronavirus in the United States...
